## Export to vector
The function `to_vect()` will return a `terra::vect` object.

```{r include = FALSE}
require(mapview)
```

```{r export_vector03, message = FALSE, eval = FALSE}
library(terra)

blueYellowRed <- function(n) grDevices::hcl.colors(n, "RdYlBu")

set.seed(123)
mask <- sample(seq_len(nrow(atl03_seg_dt)), 50)
atl03_seg_vect <- to_vect(atl03_seg_dt)

# Plot with terra::plet
mapview::mapView(
  atl03_seg_vect[mask],
  zcol = "h_ph",
  layer.name = "h_ph",
  breaks = 3,
  col.regions = blueYellowRed,
  map.types = c("Esri.WorldImagery")
)
```

<div align="center">

```{r, echo = FALSE, include = FALSE}
greenYellowRed <- function(n) {
  grDevices::hcl.colors(n, "RdYlGn")
}
blueYellowRed <- function(n) grDevices::hcl.colors(n, "RdYlBu")


if (!exists("is_readme")) {
  printMapView <- function(mapviewObj, name, output = TRUE, delay = 0.2, full = FALSE) {
    mapviewObj
  }
} else {
  library(chromote)
  chromeSession <- ChromoteSession$new(width = 800, height = 800)

  printMapView <- function(mapviewObj, name, output = TRUE, delay = 1, full = FALSE, width = "500") {
    html_temp <- tempfile(fileext = ".html")
    if (inherits(mapviewObj, "mapview")) {
      htmlwidgets::saveWidget(mapviewObj@map, html_temp)
    } else if (inherits(mapviewObj, "htmlwidgets")) {
      htmlwidgets::saveWidget(mapviewObj, html_temp)
    } else {
      stop("printMapView don't know how to handle this!")
    }

    chromeSession$Page$navigate(html_temp)

    Sys.sleep(delay)
    if (full == TRUE) {
      chromeSession$screenshot(name)
    } else {
      name <- gsub("\\.png$", "", name)
      full_path <- file.path("../..", gettextf("figure/%s.png", name))

      chromeSession$screenshot(full_path)
    }
    if (output == TRUE) {
      if (width != "") {
        width <- gettextf("width=%s ", width)
      }

      result <- knitr::asis_output(gettextf('<img src="figure/%s.png" %s/>\n', name, width))
      return(result)
    }
  }
}
```
